scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:attached: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c magenta,cyan "cd backend && nodemon index.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev:backend:detached: nohup sh -c 'cd backend && node index.js' > backend.out.log 2>&1 & echo $! > backend.pid && echo Backend PID $(cat backend.pid)
scripts.dev:backend:detached:watch: nohup sh -c 'cd backend && npx nodemon index.js' > backend.out.log 2>&1 & echo $! > backend.pid && echo Backend_watch_PID $(cat backend.pid)
scripts.dev:detached: npm run dev:backend:detached && (cd frontend && npm start)
scripts.stop:backend: test -f backend.pid && kill $(cat backend.pid) && rm backend.pid || echo 'No backend.pid'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
